description: Individual lab reports on experiments with power electronic converters, including answers to questions. Involves interface analysis and basic calculations.
Individual lab reports comparing analytical solutions with simulations for AC systems, transformers, and power calculations. Includes answering theoretical questions.
Comprehensive exam testing analytical understanding of all course material, including AC systems, power electronics, renewable energy systems, and power infrastructure.
Exam covering course material up to Week 4, focusing on AC systems, transformers, power calculations, and power electronic converters. Provides progress feedback.
